channel.title: Spartascapez New Dedicated Server - Join the revolution today - 718/736
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt][b]Information:[/b][/size][/center]
[b]Spartascapez is a new dedicated server full of fun and also practically lag and bug free,
The owner of the server is sham along with his partner solo.
The server has tons of features and high detailed graphics, Everything in the server is functional as well.
All bosses as in the following images below are also functional and have accurate drop rates, Also you can customize your spellbook to hide certain spells shown.
We also have a downloadable client and also webclient so feel free to use whichever you desire.
Overall the experience and also dedication of this server is amazing, The staff team are nice and interactive as well.
So come on mate join the revolution, Here: [color=green][url=http://spartascapez.com/]http://spartascapez.com/[/url][/color] Additions to server: - Stable Economy - 100% Uptime - 138 combat, summoning counts - Every day updates - Professional and Dedicated Staff - Active Forums - ::switchitemslook ------------Command-------------- - Donator Zone - Loyalty point system - Multiple shops - Dominion Tower - Lava Flow Mining - Bork - Yk lagor - Flambeed - Tormented Demons - Godwars bosses - Squeal of fortune. - Curses, ancients etc. -Working Revenants. (no drops added for the time being) - Queen Black Dragon - Fight Kiln - Fight Caves - Custom Dung! - Working chaotics - Dicing with dice zone and :: dice command - Working clan wars! - Great staff and community - Great PvP - Perfect switching - unique home - & Much more to come![/b] [center][size=14pt][b]IMAGES:[/b][/size][/center]
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2pggp.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/22gl1h.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2ymeq12.jpg[/img] [img]http://gyazo.com/8e34dfe73db0ef7e5dbd784923027c3f[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2z9cdaq.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/347fiie.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/2ijsuaf.png[/img] [img]http://i43.tinypic.com/htzgo6.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/4kbped.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2z6crdi.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/6r27hh.png[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/k3x448.png[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/672kg8.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/33kvkat.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/14lpp8m.png[/img] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/23tdle.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/294gex5.png[/img]
[center][size=14pt][b]Our Credits:[/b][/size][/center] [b]Credits to - Matrix. (Base) Credits to - sham. (owner) Credits to - solo. (co-owner)[/b]
[b]Join the revolution, Join spartascapez![/b] [url=http://spartascapez.com/]http://spartascapez.com/[/url]
[b]Best regards,
chaos114.[/b]

item.title: Spartascapez New Dedicated Server - Join the revolution today - 718/736
item.dc:creator: @chaos114 chaos114
item.description:
@chaos114 wrote:

[center][size=14pt]Information:[/size][/center]

[b]Spartascapez is a new dedicated server full of fun and also practically lag and bug free,

The owner of the server is sham along with his partner solo.

The server has tons of features and high detailed graphics, Everything in the server is functional as well.

All bosses as in the following images below are also functional and have accurate drop rates, Also you can customize your spellbook to hide certain spells shown.

We also have a downloadable client and also webclient so feel free to use whichever you desire.

Overall the experience and also dedication of this server is amazing, The staff team are nice and interactive as well.

So come on mate join the revolution, Here: [color=green]http://spartascapez.com/[/color]
Additions to server:

  • Stable Economy
  • 100% Uptime
  • 138 combat, summoning counts
  • Every day updates
  • Professional and Dedicated Staff
  • Active Forums
  • ::switchitemslook ------------Command--------------
  • Donator Zone
  • Loyalty point system
  • Multiple shops
  • Dominion Tower
  • Lava Flow Mining
  • Bork
  • Yk lagor
  • Flambeed
  • Tormented Demons
  • Godwars bosses
  • Squeal of fortune.
  • Curses, ancients etc.
    -Working Revenants. (no drops added for the time being)
  • Queen Black Dragon
  • Fight Kiln
  • Fight Caves
  • Custom Dung!
  • Working chaotics
  • Dicing with dice zone and :: dice command
  • Working clan wars!
  • Great staff and community
  • Great PvP
  • Perfect switching
  • unique home
  • & Much more to come![/b]
    [center][size=14pt]IMAGES:[/size][/center]

















[center][size=14pt]Our Credits:[/size][/center]
Credits to - Matrix. (Base)
Credits to - sham. (owner)
Credits to - solo. (co-owner)

Join the revolution, Join spartascapez! http://spartascapez.com/

[b]Best regards,

chaos114.[/b]
